creditline: Gift of Tom Rassieur in honor of David Ryan
description: slightly stylized portrait of a standing man with face in profile, PL, and body facing forward; black hair; very large moustache; pince-nez glasses; holding very large hat in PL hand and cane in PR hand; oversized coat with grid pattern; lines behind figure
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist%2C artist%27s estate%2C or assignees
medium: Pen and black ink over graphite
provenance: Sale, Im Kinsky Kunst Auktionen, Vienna, June 10, 1997, no. 254, to Tom Rassieur, Minneapolis; his gift to MIA, 2009
signed: Signed and dated, LRC, in black ink: [1907 Lö]
title: Peter Altenberg
